movie101_7021874945990853151_300_480.text: The scene shifts to a street where a black car suddenly brakes. The driver opens the door and steps out, while the man in the passenger seat, wearing a hat, remains seated.
The street was bustling with people coming and going, and the sound of car horns was incessant.

The car that was supposed to be a shortcut turned out to be a dead end. The assassins' car was blocked by a small stall, and the pedestrians on the street instantly became the targets of the enemies' fury. The enemies' car rams through the stalls, shooting as they go, causing chaos on the street. The pedestrians on the street are in a state of panic, running for their lives.

The drug dealer who had just fired at Fang Jie from the building was shot dead by Fang Jie. The drug dealers who had ambushed at the intersection were also defeated. One was shot in the leg, another in the arm, and the last one hit in the head. The drug dealers' firepower was greatly reduced, and Fang Jie was able to shoot them down with a single shot.

The man in black on the rooftop was still shooting down at them. The three quickly ran to a nearby car to take cover. The man in black on the rooftop saw them hiding and continued to shoot. The three ducked to avoid the bullets.
The car drove into the prison, through the iron gate, and under the hanging light bulb, it slowly came to a stop in the courtyard.
The workers were scared and fell to the ground, while the police quickly lifted the cover and looked inside.

The prison guard opened the cell door, and the people in the cell heard the sound of the door opening. They looked up and saw Fang Jie lying on the bed. Fang Jie waved his hand and said, "Fang Jie, have a good journey."
Fang Jie raised his hand weakly, then slumped forward, resting his arms on his knees. A man came in and said, 'Young Master, we are here to send you off today.'

Fang Jie was about to jump out the window when the patients rushed over. One patient was about to climb onto Fang Jie, but was pushed away by another. The bedsheet was pulled away by another patient, and Fang Jie was about to be caught.

Fang Jie dodged swiftly, kicking the thug in the chest, then grabbed his collar and stabbed him with the knife. The thug's knife was instantly slit open, and he was stabbed in the throat. Another thug charged, and Fang Jie stabbed him in the abdomen.

Fang Jie picked up a wooden plank and swung it at the man, but the man dodged and kicked Fang Jie against the wall. Fang Jie picked up another plank and swung it at the man, who blocked it with his arm and then kicked Fang Jie in the chest, sending him flying.

Fang Jie, who had been cornered, suddenly launched an attack, forcing the other person to retreat. He then used his elbow to hit the opponent's head and kicked him back. Fang Jie seized the opportunity to grab the knife and stab towards the opponent's neck.

Fang Jie was about to step forward to help when, unexpectedly, a group of people rushed in from the back door and started fighting with him. In the chaotic fight, the prison door was opened, and a policeman came to check.

Fang Jie, with a smile on his face, looked up at the man in front of him and said, 'Have a good journey.' The man, unharmed, staggered to his feet and stumbled out of the factory. Fang Jie stood up, his eyes filled with determination.

Fang Jie, who had been locked up, suddenly broke free from the handcuffs and rushed towards the outside of the prison. The guards who were guarding the prison saw this and shouted, 'Someone is escaping! Don't let him get away!'

Fang Jie quickly threw the police officer to the ground, then turned and ran towards the second floor. The officers behind him were in a panic, unsure of where he might go. Fang Jie reached the second floor and looked around, while the officers were still searching the ground floor for him.
Fang Jie, who had been locked in the cell, suddenly broke free. He picked up a gun from the rack and fired wildly at the guards outside the door. The cell door opened, and Fang Jie crawled out.

movie101_7166164445343941151_3240_3420.text: Zhao Bing, who was trying on clothes in the store, heard Xu Decai's voice and quickly took out her phone from her bag to answer. Xu Decai said: "Sorry, I couldn't make it." Zhao Bing said: "What's going on?" Xu Decai said: "We need to talk in person."

Xu Decai looked back and saw the man in the leather jacket who had previously attempted to steal the Mercedes. He quickly unbuckled his seatbelt, opened the car door, and jumped out.

movie101_7166164445343941151_3420_3600.text: Wang Xiaobing, seeing the other party getting away, quickly threw a grenade at the car. The grenade landed right in front of A Qiang's car, and the two inside were thrown about due to the impact. Seeing this, A Qiang quickly opened the door and ran away.

Xu Decai and A Qiang were running frantically on the streets, looking around for the person who had just run past. They ran to a small alley, and just as they were about to reach the end, they saw the person they were looking for darting across the other side of the road.

The group of Simon and David behind them were still at a disadvantage. They had to retreat while laying down cover. The two groups cooperated seamlessly, covering each other's flanks as they retreated.

Mr. Wu asked, "Are there any rules in your line of work?" Zhang Hua, with eyes closed, replied, "Yes, money."
Mr. Wu squatted and said, "The most important thing in kidnapping is to get the money, not to take someone's life. Back in the day, those old-time bandits, they..."
Mr. Wu said, "Back in the day is too far back. I can't understand ancient times." Zhang Hua sat on the sofa, warming himself by the stove, listening to Mr. Wu's story.

Mr. Wu stared at him and said, "Then let's talk about the present. There's someone in Hong Kong doing the same job as you. I know who you're talking about, but to me, he's nothing. At least he has rules in this job."

Mr. Wu said, "Maybe it's because I served in the military." Zhang Hua was silent after hearing this, and the two remained in a standoff for a long time. The night was deep, and the city lights were bright.

Zhang Hua flipped over the New Year's picture and said, "Thirty-nine, I think it's thirty-nine." "You don't look old at all!" "Fates are different. Some are in the heavens, and some are on the ground."
Mr. Wu said, "You don't need to complain so much, sometimes. It's not other people's problem, it's our own. I'm not just talking about you, I am selfish too, and..."

Mr. Wu looked up at Zhang Hua and said, "What problem do you think I have?" "You don't have a problem." "Right." "You think you don't have a problem." "No problem at all." "I spent nine years in prison." "It was like a lifetime." "I finally got out."
Mr. Wu said, "Nine years is over, do something proper." "Yes." "What do you mean by proper?" "Tell me what's proper." "Find a job." "Work." "Be an actor."

movie101_7173948149160116773_5100_5280.text: Mu Lang's eyes were fierce, and he struck Bai Sankong's ear, causing blood to gush out. The two brothers looked at each other, their eyes filled with murderous intent. The tense standoff between them was palpable, as if the outcome of the contest would determine their fates.

movie101_7026623602615452196_4500_4680.text: Xiao Bao pulled Ye Hong and ran into the forest. The men in black were still chasing them. Xiao Bao ran while looking back to assess the situation. Ye Hong was exhausted and needed rest, but Xiao Bao pushed her to run faster.

movie101_7173948149160116773_5280_5460.text: Da Zang said: "We're brothers." The two looked at each other, their eyes filled with determination. Mu Lang leapt down from the high platform, and the two prepared to confront him.

Fang Baoyu was not to be outdone, he leaped up and slashed down with his sword, but Mu Lang blocked it with his own sword. The two were evenly matched and their silhouettes became visible against the backdrop of the setting sun.

Fang Baoyu was also no pushover; he blocked Mu Lang's attack with his sword and then slashed at Mu Lang's chest. Mu Lang parried the blow and, seeing the battle was not going her way, tried to stab Fang Baoyu's lower body. Fang Baoyu was quick to react and kicked Mu Lang away.
Fang Baoyu was stunned for a moment, but then he saw Da Zang leap into the air, rushing towards Mu Lang. Mu Lang blocked with his sword, and the three of them were entangled in a fierce battle.

The three of them leaped onto the city wall and hid behind the soldiers' shields, waiting for an opportunity. The soldiers' armor was studded with silver coins, and when Fang Baoyu looked closely, he saw that the long swords in their hands were actually broken bamboo sticks.

Mu Lang and Fang Baoyu both looked at him with anger, but their eyes were not as sharp as before. The soldiers behind them were already impatient. Seeing the other side's attitude, Mu Lang and Fang Baoyu had to give up. They put down their guns and walked towards the city gate.

Da Zang's moves were swift and accurate, each strike aimed at his opponent's vital points. The other party was forced to retreat repeatedly. In an instant, he knocked the long sword out of Mu Lang's hand and kicked him several meters away.

Fang Baoyu, who had been hiding nearby, was shocked by the scene before him. He never expected that Mu Lang, who had accompanied him through so much, would end up this way. The once handsome and dashing image of Mu Lang had now turned into one of a blood-stained ferocious warrior.

Mu Lang, holding the sword, looked at Fang Baoyu, who was lying on the ground, and then at the bloodstains on his own sword. He then looked down at the body of Da Zang.
Mu Lang, seeing the other party's move, was not afraid at all, he raised his sword and chopped towards Fang Baoyu.
Mu Lang and Duchess Tuo Chen were evenly matched, and the situation seemed to be reaching a stalemate.

After throwing several stones, Drug Dealer got up and went back to the car. He opened the passenger door, sat down, then got up again, closed the door, and walked to the back of the car to open the trunk.

Dentist was lying on the ground, his eyes half-open, looking at Drug Dealer. The latter was panting heavily, his face filled with guilt. The scene in the bathroom was also a shocking discovery for both of them.

He lifted the toilet lid, scooped up a handful of water, and splashed it onto the paper bag. After that, he put the paper bag into a plastic bag and tied it up. Then he looked up at the sky and took a deep breath.

He looked up at the ceiling, then at the washing machine beside him. After a while, he picked up the basin next to the washing machine, opened the trash can in front of the toilet, and dumped the basin's contents into the trash can.
He then opened the trash can, took out a white package, and placed it on the toilet lid. The bottles on the table in front of the toilet were particularly noticeable.

He then took out a trash can and poured the remaining powder from the plastic bag into it. After that, he picked up the bag and walked towards the toilet. Once he opened the door, he was shocked to find that the toilet was full of empty liquor bottles.

He then took out the medicine from the box and poured it into the bottle. After that, he went to the ceiling and fixed the light. After repairing, he turned on the light, looked at the ceiling, and then turned off the light.

He pried open the ceiling tiles one by one, revealing a hidden compartment. He then took out a wooden board from the ceiling and placed it on the ground. After that, he went to the bathroom, closed the door, and locked it with a deadbolt.
He then took out a mop and a bucket from under the sink and started to clean the floor. The toilet was also scrubbed until it was spotless.
He then went to the toilet, took off his underwear, and stuffed it into the toilet bowl. Afterward, he pulled out his gun and aimed it at the mirror.
The gun was aimed at a little girl hiding in the corner, Xiao An. The barrel was pointed directly at her head. Xiao An was scared and shrank back into the corner, silently pleading for mercy.

The scene shifts, and Xiao An is sitting on the toilet, staring blankly ahead. The next scene shows the two of them walking side by side along the riverbank. Dentist said, "Is my godfather dead or alive" "He was killed on the spot"

"Then he was killed by him."

movie101_7176565114756137528_1320_1500.text: The two walked forward, and Mo Han shouted, 'Those who want money, come out. Those who don't want their lives, come out too.'

Che Zhenshan and Mo Han both drew their guns, and Lin Lin said, 'First, put down your guns, put them all down.' The two were startled by Lin Lin's voice. Che Zhenshan handed his gun to Mo Han and retreated with Lin Lin.

Che Zhenshan asked: "Where is my daughter?" The masked man replied: "She's right here with us. Did you bring the ransom?" Che Zhenshan said: "A hundred taels of gold, not a single coin less. Please hand over my daughter."

The bandit leader: 'Deal.' The three of them were about to leave when they heard gunshots. The three stopped and looked towards the source of the sound. A group of masked bandits suddenly rushed out from the bushes, and Lin Lin was captured.

Mo Han took the handkerchief from Lin Lin's mouth, wrapped it around her hand, and helped her down the slope. The enemy was still searching for the team, and the surrounding gunfire kept hitting him. He had to keep firing back to protect himself, but his bullets were few. At this moment, he realized the danger of the situation. He had to make a quick decision.

Mo Han was shot in the abdomen by Che Zhenshan's subordinate Lu Xiao. Mo Han fell to the ground, and Lin Lin, seeing this, screamed in heart-wrenching despair.
The scene shifted, and the enemy's artillery fire grew fiercer. Mo Han was seriously injured and was taken to the hospital for treatment.
Mo Han, who had been unconscious for a long time, finally opened his eyes. Lin Lin came over and said, "You're awake?"
Mo Han said: "Where am I?" Mo Han replied: "Medical room." Mo Han weakly said: "I'm still alive."
Lin Lin said: "The doctor said the bullet almost hit your heart." Mo Han looked at Lin Lin and said: "For me, Mo Han, I had misjudged you before."

The two of them lay in the pit, motionless. Driver angrily smashed the shovel into the pit, and the scene returned to reality.

The two lay on the ground, their eyes vacant, while the master ground the herbs into powder with a mortar and pestle, his face expressionless.

The scene shifted to dusk, with the sky gradually darkening. Driver, who had been waiting for a long time, finally came to the riverside. He first looked around, then hurriedly ran to the side of the boat.
The scene shifts to the riverbank at night. Driver was repairing a boat. Female Student stood nearby, looking at the boat. Driver noticed her and gently touched her head.

movie101_6992521335159292452_3060_3240.text: Jiang Feng looked at Li Xiaoyun in front of him, his eyes full of compassion. She looked at Jiang Feng with wide eyes, tears streaming down her face. Jiang Feng looked at her and asked, "Who was it?"

Jiang Feng, with a gentle smile, looked at Li Xiaoyun and then led her to the bed, slowly sat her down, and comforted her, saying: "Don't be scared." Then he took off the headphones from Li Xiaoyun's head.
Jiang Feng squatted in front of Li Xiaoyun, took the headphones from her, and looked at her with deep affection.
He slowly lifted his head, tears streaming down his face. He stared blankly ahead, his emotions finally breaking down as he cried.
Jiang Feng, seeing the two silent, leaned in and said: "I'll go get my dad."
Jiang Feng looked at Li Xiaoyun and said: "I'm sorry, I was wrong. I shouldn't have hit you. You're right, I was wrong."

The scene shifted, and Jiang Feng, with a hangover, squinted his eyes and slowly walked downstairs. At the bottom of the stairs, Li Xiaoyun and his wife were sprawled on the floor, having passed out. Jiang Feng stared at them in disbelief.

The butler, who had been watching the two, was startled by Li Xiaoyun's words. He turned around and saw the three people lying on the ground, then looked at the television, which was playing a video of the same scene. The three people in the video were also lying on the ground, and the camera slowly zoomed in.

Jiang Feng was stunned, his eyes darting around as he tried to understand what was happening. Li Xiaoyun walked past him, heading deeper into the room. Jiang Feng stood there, stunned, watching Li Xiaoyun. Li Xiaoyun walked to the center of the room and looked at the bodies on the floor.

Jiang Feng looked at Li Xiaoyun with a face full of pleading, but Li Xiaoyun stubbornly shook her head. Jiang Feng sighed and said, "Just go. You staying here will just cause trouble."
Jiang Feng looked at Li Xiaoyun and said: "Just go. You staying here will just cause trouble."
Jiang Feng's words were heartfelt, but they fell on deaf ears. Li Xiaoyun knelt down beside the corpse of their mother, staring blankly at Jiang Feng.

Jiang Feng's eyes were red, he swallowed hard, trying to stop the tears from falling. But the tears already streaming down his face couldn't be stopped. He looked at Li Xiaoyun in front of him, his eyes filled with endless guilt and self-blame. He wanted to say something to Li Xiaoyun, but the words stuck in his throat, turning into the most painful knife, piercing his heart.

He quickly walked towards the source of the sound, his steps growing heavier with each step. He wanted to rush forward, but his legs wouldn't cooperate. He looked at the familiar figure in front of him, his heart pounding in his chest.

She scooped up a handful of water from the river, and a little fish suddenly wriggled in her cupped hands. Li Xiaoyun stared at the little fish, which then jumped out of her hands, flapping its gills vigorously in the air. Jiang Feng stood at a distance, watching the scene unfold.

movie101_6967711402819584543_4080_4260.text: The sound of the door opening attracted Killer's attention. He turned his head to look at the door, then turned back to face forward. He took a deep breath, clenched his fists, and then released them.

Older Brother, who had been waiting outside for a long time, finally had the door opened. He didn't rush in immediately but stood at the door and looked inside. The Killer inside the room didn't seem to be in a hurry either, just standing by the bed gazing out the window.

The sound of the ball rolling came from the end of the hallway. Killer walked slowly towards the sound. His steps were slow and heavy, as if his feet were dragging something. He stopped at the door of the room at the end of the hallway, and the shadow on his face was unusually sharp.

Killer looked at the iron door in front of him, and the iron chain hanging on the wall, then raised his hand to touch the pass hanging on the wall. He looked at the pass, then at the iron door, and finally at the iron chain.

Older Brother leaned against the wall, his eyes scanning the room. The door was slowly pushed open, but there was no sign of Killer. The light in the room suddenly turned on, and the bulb flickered a few times before it was turned on.

Older Brother, who had been waiting outside for a long time, finally saw the person he was looking for. He slowly approached Killer, his eyes revealing a trace of unease.

Older Brother's eyes darted around, constantly observing Killer's movements. Killer slowly moved his footsteps, preparing to strike, but Older Brother's slight movement scared him into stopping his next move.

Older Brother looked down at the door lock, then raised his head to look at Killer. Killer gave a slight nod. Older Brother took a deep breath, forcefully pushed the door with his foot, and the lock was instantly smashed. Killer rushed in, but Older Brother was already gone.

Older Brother, who had been squatting outside the door for a long time, finally stood up when he saw the situation, and then walked into the room, throwing the evidence bag into the trash can.

Older Brother, who had been lying in wait for a long time, finally saw the opportunity to act. He swiftly pulled the trigger, and the Killer inside the room was instantly subdued. The two quickly exited the room, and the door was firmly closed.

He struggled to crawl towards the door, but his legs were pinned by the fallen pipe. He picked up the axe on the ground and stood up, but his hands were still tied behind his back.

The two of them sat on opposite sides of the table, each with a clenched fist on the table, their minds filled with thoughts of killing. The interrogation began.

movie101_6967711402819584543_480_660.text: The worn-out Young Police Officer, after finishing the day's work, returned to the repair shop. The interior of the repair shop was very dilapidated, with only a few tables and chairs left, and the paint on the walls was long overdue for renovation.

movie101_7176565114756137528_3120_3300.text: After hanging up the phone, Hong Zichen's expression changed. He furrowed his brows, thought for a moment, then quickly ran out of the office.

Hong Zichen said: 'Bro, in this war between the Nationalists and Communists, who knows who will win. We profiteers shouldn’t be at odds.'

Hong Zichen, seeing that he had fooled the man, smiled and returned the gun to him.

Hong Zichen said: "Birds of a feather, indeed. So, from now on, let’s meet at the place we agreed on earlier, how's that sound?"
Hong Zichen watched as Man ran away, took out his pistol, and quickly caught up with him.

movie101_6992521335159292452_360_540.text: The staff member said: "Congratulations, your memory has been successfully deleted," "Mr. Jiang, we need your blood for DNA matching." Jiang Feng wiped his tears, turned his head to look at the machine, and then smiled at the staff member.

movie101_7228950501038293560_60_240.text: Wu Zheng stood by the roadside with a professional camera, covertly capturing the women's activities. The women washing clothes by the river noticed him and waved at him.
